name: Honour Amongst One's Peers (Child of Dynasty)

description.value: Honour Amongst One's Peers: Even the most unimportant offspring of a Rogue Trader dynasty are likely to have grown up amongst the rarefied heights of Imperial aristocracy, and can handle themselves amongst them without embarrassment. A Child of Dynasty gains a +5 bonus to all Fellowship Tests to interact with high-ranking officials of the Imperium and members of the Imperial nobility in a formal setting (exactly when this bonus applies is up to the GM).

system.benefit: You gain +5 to Fellowship Tests when interacting with high-ranking officials and Imperial nobility in formal settings.

skills.condition: Fellowship Tests with high-ranking officials/nobility (formal settings)

system.notes: +5 to Fellowship Tests with officials/nobility in formal settings
